title: Language Help: Translation (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Translation subcategory within Language Help. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: How do you say it in Japanese?
cards.romaji: Kore wa nihongo de do iimasu ka?
cards.japanese: これは日本語でどう言いますか？

cards.english: How do you say [ ] in Japanese?
cards.romaji: [ ] wa nihongo de do iimasu ka?
cards.japanese: [ ]は日本語でどう言いますか？

cards.english: How do you say this in Japanese?
cards.romaji: Kore wa nihongo de do imasu ka.
cards.japanese: これは日本語でどう言いますか。
